create-view.view-definition: SELECT DB29023216.TESTFUNC()
SELECT DB29023216.TESTFUNC(NOW())
SELECT DB29023216.TESTFUNC(1,2,3,4)
SELECT * FROM films WHERE kind = 'Comedy'
SELECT * FROM comedies WHERE classification = 'U'
VALUES (1) UNION ALL SELECT n+1 FROM nums_1_100 WHERE n = 100
SELECT * FROM t_order
select p.name planet, p.class, m.name moon, m.radius from planets p, moons m where p.name = m.planet_name(+) and m.name(+) not like 'S/%'
SELECT * FROM laurel.emp
SELECT * FROM scott.dept
SELECT empno, ename, mgr, deptno FROM company.emp
SELECT empno, ename, deptno FROM emp
SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, EMAIL, MANAGER_ID FROM EMPLOYEES
SELECT e1.ename, e2.empno, e2.deptno FROM emp e1, emp e2 WHERE e1.empno = e2.empno
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary < 10000
SELECT employee_id, last_name, department_id FROM employees, departments WHERE employees.department_id = departments.department_id
SELECT employee_id, last_name, department_id, job_id FROM employees WHERE job_id = 'PU_CLERK' or job_id = 'SH_CLERK' or job_id = 'ST_CLERK'
SELECT last_name, salary*12 annual_salary FROM employees WHERE department_id = 20
SELECT empno, ename, deptno FROM emp WHERE sal > 1000
SELECT e.*, Loc, d.dname FROM emp_v e, dept d WHERE e.deptno = d.deptno (+)
SELECT employee_id, last_name, job_id, salary, commission_pct, department_id FROM employees WHERE department_id = 50
SELECT d.department_id, d.department_name, l.location_id, l.city FROM departments d, locations l WHERE d.location_id = l.location_id
SELECT e.empno, e.ename, e.deptno, d.dname, d.loc FROM emp e, dept d WHERE e.deptno (+) = d.deptno
SELECT last_name, salary FROM employees WHERE last_name = USER
SELECT employee_id, last_name, department_id FROM employees, departments WHERE employees.department_id = departments.department_id
SELECT * FROM sales PARTITION (SALES_Q1_2000)
SELECT employee_id, last_name, department_id, job_id FROM employees WHERE job_id = 'PU_CLERK' or job_id = 'SH_CLERK' or job_id = 'ST_CLERK'
SELECT e1.ename, e2.ename mname FROM emp e1, emp e2 WHERE e1.mgr = e2.empno
(SELECT employee_id, last_name, job_id, commission_pct, department_id FROM employees) UNION (SELECT employee_id, last_name, job_id, commission_pct, department_id FROM contract_workers)
SELECT e.empnum, e.ename, e.salary, e.job FROM emp_table e WHERE job = 'Developer'
SELECT d.deptno, d.deptname, address_t(d.deptstreet,d.deptcity,d.deptstate,d.deptzip) AS deptaddr FROM dept d
SELECT a.empno, a.ename, b.dname FROM scott.emp a, jward.dept@hq.example.com b WHERE a.deptno = b.deptno
SELECT deptno, MIN(sal), AVG(sal), MAX(sal) FROM emp GROUP BY deptno ORDER BY deptno
SELECT ename, empno, job, dname FROM emp, dept WHERE emp.deptno IN (10, 30) AND emp.deptno = dept.deptno
SELECT emp.empno, emp.ename, emp.deptno, emp.sal, dept.dname, dept.loc FROM emp, dept WHERE emp.deptno = dept.deptno AND dept.loc IN ('DALLAS', 'NEW YORK', 'BOSTON')
SELECT cust_last_name, nls_language, credit_limit FROM customers
SELECT * FROM employees AS OF TIMESTAMP (SYSTIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '60' MINUTE)
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department_id = SYS_CONTEXT('hr_context', 'department_id')
SELECT e.employee_id, e.last_name, e.job_id FROM employees e WHERE job_id = 'IT_PROG'
SELECT employee_id, last_name, email FROM employees
SELECT employee_id, last_name, salary, location_id FROM employees JOIN departments USING (department_id) WHERE department_id = 10
SELECT empno, ename, deptno FROM emp WHERE deptno = 10

SELECT prod_name product, country_name country, channel_id channel, SUBSTR(calendar_quarter_desc, 6,2) quarter, SUM(amount_sold) amount_sold, SUM(quantity_sold) quantity_sold FROM sales, times, customers, countries, products WHERE sales.time_id = times.time_id AND sales.prod_id = products.prod_id AND sales.cust_id = customers.cust_id AND customers.country_id = countries.country_id GROUP BY prod_name, country_name, channel_id, SUBSTR(calendar_quarter_desc, 6, 2)

SELECT country_name country, prod_name product, calendar_year year, calendar_month_name month, SUM(amount_sold) sale, COUNT(amount_sold) cnt FROM sales, times, customers, countries, products WHERE sales.time_id = times.time_id AND sales.prod_id = products.prod_id AND sales.cust_id = customers.cust_id AND customers.country_id = countries.country_id GROUP BY country_name, prod_name, calendar_year, calendar_month_name

SELECT country_name country, prod_name product, calendar_year year, SUM(amount_sold) sales, COUNT(amount_sold) cnt, MAX(calendar_year) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY SUM(amount_sold) DESC) OVER (PARTITION BY country_name, prod_name) best_year, MAX(calendar_year) KEEP (DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY SUM(amount_sold) DESC) OVER (PARTITION BY country_name, prod_name) worst_year FROM sales, times, customers, countries, products WHERE sales.time_id = times.time_id AND sales.prod_id = products.prod_id AND sales.cust_id =customers.cust_id AND customers.country_id=countries.country_id GROUP BY country_name, prod_name, calendar_year

aggregation-projection.expression: MAX(calendar_year) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY SUM(amount_sold) DESC) OVER (PARTITION BY country_name, prod_name)
MAX(calendar_year) KEEP (DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY SUM(amount_sold) DESC) OVER (PARTITION BY country_name, prod_name)

create-view.view-definition: SELECT d.deptno, d.deptname, CAST(MULTISET(SELECT e.ename, e.salary, e.deptname, CAST(MULTISET(SELECT p.projname, p.mgr FROM projects p WHERE p.mgr = e.ename) AS nt_project_t) FROM emps e WHERE e.deptname = d.deptname) AS nt_emp_t) FROM depts d

expression-projection.text: CAST(MULTISET(SELECT e.ename, e.salary, e.deptname, CAST(MULTISET(SELECT p.projname, p.mgr FROM projects p WHERE p.mgr = e.ename) AS nt_project_t) FROM emps e WHERE e.deptname = d.deptname) AS nt_emp_t)

function.text: CAST(MULTISET(SELECT e.ename, e.salary, e.deptname, CAST(MULTISET(SELECT p.projname, p.mgr FROM projects p WHERE p.mgr = e.ename) AS nt_project_t) FROM emps e WHERE e.deptname = d.deptname) AS nt_emp_t)

expression-projection.text: CAST(MULTISET(SELECT p.projname, p.mgr FROM projects p WHERE p.mgr = e.ename) AS nt_project_t)

function.text: CAST(MULTISET(SELECT p.projname, p.mgr FROM projects p WHERE p.mgr = e.ename) AS nt_project_t)

create-view.view-definition: SELECT VALUE(p) AS warehouse_xml FROM xwarehouses p
SELECT time_id, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(time_id, 'ddd')) AS day_in_year FROM times
(SELECT c.rowid crid, c.cust_id, 2 umarker FROM customers c WHERE c.cust_last_name = 'Smith' UNION ALL SELECT c.rowid crid, c.cust_id, 3 umarker FROM customers c WHERE c.cust_last_name = 'Jones')
SELECT sys_XMLGen(emp_t(e.employee_id, e.first_name, e.last_name, e.hire_date),XMLFormat('EMP')) FROM employees e WHERE salary > 15000
